Not bad, but..."},{"lineNumber":60243,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝つ方が、面白ェに決まってる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's definitely more fun to win!\""},{"lineNumber":60244,"originalJapaneseLine":"跳躍。","translatedEnglishLine":"A leap."},{"lineNumber":60245,"originalJapaneseLine":"片方が鉄の爪を嵌めた拳で襲いかかり、","translatedEnglishLine":"One attacked with a fist fitted with iron claws,"},{"lineNumber":60246,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう片方が懐から呼び子を引き抜く。","translatedEnglishLine":"While the other drew a whistle from inside his clothes."},{"lineNumber":60247,"originalJapaneseLine":"突き込まれる鉄の爪を無敵結界で弾き落とし、","translatedEnglishLine":"He deflected the thrusting iron claws with an invincible barrier,"},{"lineNumber":60248,"originalJapaneseLine":"勢いを殺さず突き飛ばして奥へ。","translatedEnglishLine":"And pushed forward without losing momentum, sending the attacker flying backward."},{"lineNumber":60249,"originalJapaneseLine":"呼び子を吹かれる前に喉から顎にかけてを蹴り砕く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Before the whistle could be blown, he kicked from throat to jaw, shattering it."},{"lineNumber":60250,"originalJapaneseLine":"意識を手放して落下していく片割れから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Glancing back at the partner losing consciousness and falling,"},{"lineNumber":60251,"originalJapaneseLine":"鉄の爪の男へと視線を戻すと、","translatedEnglishLine":"He shifted his gaze back to the man with iron claws,"},{"lineNumber":60252,"originalJapaneseLine":"男は小さな丸いものを足下に叩きつける所だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Who was about to slam a small round object at his feet."},{"lineNumber":60253,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――ッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"――――!\""},

{"lineNumber":60254,"originalJapaneseLine":"朱い草原を、一瞬だけ鮮烈な光が塗り替える。","translatedEnglishLine":"A momentary vivid light painted the crimson grassland."},

{"lineNumber":60255,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのまま逃げていく黒装束の背中に爪先をねじ込む。","translatedEnglishLine":"He twisted his toe into the back of the fleeing black-clad figure."},

{"lineNumber":60256,"originalJapaneseLine":"直撃すれば背骨を蹴り潰すのは容易なはずだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct hit should have easily crushed the spine, but"},

{"lineNumber":60257,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまでの手応えはなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"there was no such feedback."},

{"lineNumber":60258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch...!\""},

{"lineNumber":60259,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐに、また兵士どもがやってくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soon, soldiers came again."},

{"lineNumber":60260,"originalJapaneseLine":"賞金首を求める内容の声が、遠くから近づいてくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Voices calling for the bounty target approached from afar."},

{"lineNumber":60261,"originalJapaneseLine":"重さを感じる身体を引きずるようにして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Dragging his heavy-feeling body,"},

{"lineNumber":60262,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイはその場から移動していった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei moved away from that place."},

{"lineNumber":60263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レイの野郎はまだ見つからんのか、くそ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Have you still not found that bastard Rei? Damn!\""},

{"lineNumber":60264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん、ごめん……探してるんだけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah, sorry... we're searching, though.\""},{"lineNumber":60265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時々、報告は上がるんだけど、逃げられてるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We get reports occasionally, but he keeps escaping."},

{"lineNumber":60266,"originalJapaneseLine":"　傍目にはさほど特徴のない人間一人だし、","translatedEnglishLine":"He looks like an ordinary person to outsiders,"},

{"lineNumber":60267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手間は掛かりそうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"so it seems like it will be troublesome.\""},{"lineNumber":60268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ……あのビリビリ野郎め、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch... that crackling bastard,"},{"lineNumber":60269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大人しく俺様に殺されればいいものを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he should just quietly let me kill him...\""},{"lineNumber":60270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様。捜索隊の方から、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance. From the search party,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まごう事なき、窮地だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was undoubtedly a desperate situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、苛立ちと同時に、自然と唇が歪んでくるのを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But at the same time as his frustration, he couldn't help but notice his lips curling naturally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイは自覚せざるを得なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei was forced to acknowledge it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、くくく、やってくれる、ぜッ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, kukuku, this is gonna be fun..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方が何をしようと、関係はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It didn't matter what his allies did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道義だのなんだのにも、興味はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had no interest in morality or anything like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分には、敵が必要なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He needed an enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも、とびきり大きく、強大なのがいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it had to be exceptionally large and powerful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それと力で相対している時だけ、退屈が消える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only when facing such a force could his boredom disappear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もない、空っぽのレイの中身に、刺激が走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A spark of excitement ran through the empty void inside Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類全体と殺り合う、ってのは……悪くねェ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To battle against all of humanity... isn't bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あぁ、悪くねェ…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, it's not bad at all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その人類の代表に、あのランスがいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And representing that humanity was that Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴と、人類と、冷静に、全力で殺し合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To calmly and fiercely kill each other—he and humanity, with that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終的に勝つために、逃亡もする。それでいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Escaping in order to ultimately win. That's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暇つぶしの為のゴミではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's not some trash to waste time on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身全霊での闘争に値する、敵手だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's an opponent worthy of a fight with all his heart and soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気配。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A presence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音もなく、黒装束の二人組が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without a sound, two figures clad in black approached.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背面から接近しつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were approaching from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ……悪くねぇ、が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Not bad, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ方が、面白ェに決まってる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's definitely more fun to win!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 跳躍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A leap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片方が鉄の爪を嵌めた拳で襲いかかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One attacked with a fist fitted with iron claws,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう片方が懐から呼び子を引き抜く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While the other drew a whistle from inside his clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突き込まれる鉄の爪を無敵結界で弾き落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He deflected the thrusting iron claws with an invincible barrier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勢いを殺さず突き飛ばして奥へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And pushed forward without losing momentum, sending the attacker flying backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び子を吹かれる前に喉から顎にかけてを蹴り砕く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the whistle could be blown, he kicked from throat to jaw, shattering it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識を手放して落下していく片割れから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glancing back at the partner losing consciousness and falling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄の爪の男へと視線を戻すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He shifted his gaze back to the man with iron claws,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は小さな丸いものを足下に叩きつける所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who was about to slam a small round object at his feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朱い草原を、一瞬だけ鮮烈な光が塗り替える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A momentary vivid light painted the crimson grassland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま逃げていく黒装束の背中に爪先をねじ込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He twisted his toe into the back of the fleeing black-clad figure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃すれば背骨を蹴り潰すのは容易なはずだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct hit should have easily crushed the spine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでの手応えはなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no such feedback.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに、また兵士どもがやってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, soldiers came again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 賞金首を求める内容の声が、遠くから近づいてくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Voices calling for the bounty target approached from afar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重さを感じる身体を引きずるようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dragging his heavy-feeling body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイはその場から移動していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei moved away from that place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイの野郎はまだ見つからんのか、くそ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have you still not found that bastard Rei? Damn!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うん、ごめん……探してるんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah, sorry... we're searching, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時々、報告は上がるんだけど、逃げられてるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We get reports occasionally, but he keeps escaping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍目にはさほど特徴のない人間一人だし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looks like an ordinary person to outsiders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間は掛かりそうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it seems like it will be troublesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……あのビリビリ野郎め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... that crackling bastard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大人しく俺様に殺されればいいものを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he should just quietly let me kill him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様。捜索隊の方から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance. From the search party,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were approaching from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ……悪くねぇ、が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Not bad, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ方が、面白ェに決まってる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's definitely more fun to win!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 跳躍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A leap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片方が鉄の爪を嵌めた拳で襲いかかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One attacked with a fist fitted with iron claws,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう片方が懐から呼び子を引き抜く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While the other drew a whistle from inside his clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突き込まれる鉄の爪を無敵結界で弾き落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He deflected the thrusting iron claws with an invincible barrier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勢いを殺さず突き飛ばして奥へ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And pushed forward without losing momentum, sending the attacker flying backward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼び子を吹かれる前に喉から顎にかけてを蹴り砕く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the whistle could be blown, he kicked from throat to jaw, shattering it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意識を手放して落下していく片割れから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Glancing back at the partner losing consciousness and falling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄の爪の男へと視線を戻すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He shifted his gaze back to the man with iron claws,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は小さな丸いものを足下に叩きつける所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who was about to slam a small round object at his feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朱い草原を、一瞬だけ鮮烈な光が塗り替える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A momentary vivid light painted the crimson grassland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま逃げていく黒装束の背中に爪先をねじ込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He twisted his toe into the back of the fleeing black-clad figure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃すれば背骨を蹴り潰すのは容易なはずだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct hit should have easily crushed the spine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでの手応えはなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no such feedback.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに、また兵士どもがやってくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soon, soldiers came again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 賞金首を求める内容の声が、遠くから近づいてくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Voices calling for the bounty target approached from afar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重さを感じる身体を引きずるようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dragging his heavy-feeling body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイはその場から移動していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rei moved away from that place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイの野郎はまだ見つからんのか、くそ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have you still not found that bastard Rei? Damn!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うん、ごめん……探してるんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah, sorry... we're searching, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時々、報告は上がるんだけど、逃げられてるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We get reports occasionally, but he keeps escaping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍目にはさほど特徴のない人間一人だし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looks like an ordinary person to outsiders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手間は掛かりそうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it seems like it will be troublesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ……あのビリビリ野郎め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... that crackling bastard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大人しく俺様に殺されればいいものを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he should just quietly let me kill him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様。捜索隊の方から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance. From the search party,
